mapper.select: select * from purchase where purchase_no=#{purchase_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from purchase where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into purchase(purchase_no, code, id, name, purchase_date, address, telnum) values(#{purchase_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete * from purchase where purchase_no=#{purchase_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
